game.name: Desktop Girl Chika
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 캡션 이용 가능, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: On your desktop, Chika is not a passive decoration, but a presence with emotions, memory, and independent judgment. You are not “controlling” her; you are accompanying her growth—through time, interaction, and choice, giving her a complete and unique life.
game.shortDescriptionEn: On your desktop, Chika is not a passive decoration, but a presence with emotions, memory, and independent judgment. You are not “controlling” her; you are accompanying her growth—through time, interaction, and choice, giving her a complete and unique life.
